replies.body:
I'm assuming someone is harassing you in game or on one of the avicus platforms about you being "bad"(?)
If so just get evidence and make a player report here : https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47
Don't listen to other people, if you know you're good then that's all that should matter :P

Sorry to tell you but this is a block game, 1v1's won't make you seem tougher. This thread will be locked but just play minecraft for fun. In the end it won't be minecraft PvP that gets you anywhere, but sports and education. So turn off that computer if someone is saying unnecessary shit, and do something else
